#summary Describes the CLI commands used by the plugin

= Introduction =


= Details =

== si viewsandbox --filter=changed:working ==
selects all members locally modified

== si viewsandbox --filter=changed:sync ==
selects all members which are out of sync (member-revision and working revision are different)
=> candidates for incoming changes

== si viewsandbox --filter=changed:working --filter=!locked:$user$ ==
selects all members that have been modified without checkout (not locked by user)
